title: John
content: Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath has directed the state police department to embrace the technology for the mega event.

title: John
content: The Maha Kumbh will begin on 14th January 2025 with Makar Sankranti and end on 26 February 2025 with Maha Shivratri.

title: John
content: An estimated 40 crore people are likely to visit Prayagraj during the 45-day Maha Kumbh, slated to begin on January 13, 2025.
